xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 16 April 2014
xwikidoc.content: <vijay13> has quit 06:03 <vijay13> has quit 06:53 <Csine> has quit 10:03 <vijay13> has quit 12:58 <SayAsh> has joined #phenotips 13:23 <vijay13> has quit 14:01 <akats> sdumitriu: Do you have a few minutes. Some things I wanted to talk about. 14:02 <sdumitriu> Sure 14:03 <akats> I'd have to show you 14:04 <sdumitriu> Be there soon 14:29 <SayAsh> has quit 15:06 <akats> for this issue https://github.com/phenotips/phenomecentral.org/issues/3, the patient record needs to belong to a group. Is my guess correct? 15:06 <sdumitriu> No 15:07 <sdumitriu> It needs to belong to someone else, but be shared (editable) with the current user 15:07 <vijay13> has quit 15:07 <sdumitriu> But indeed, if it belongs to a group, then the form should be displayed for any member of the group 15:08 <akats> Oh, like that even 15:08 <akats> Ok 16:37 <akats> I sent a pull request for phenomecentral. I'm not sure if this is exactly what you're looking for. 16:38 <sdumitriu> Nope 16:39 <sdumitriu> You should explicitly check if owner == current user or owner is a group and current user is member of that group 16:40 <akats> So a document cannot be owned by a person and a group at the same time? 16:41 <vijay13_> has quit 16:41 <sdumitriu> Nope 16:41 <sdumitriu> There's only one owner at the moment 16:41 <sdumitriu> Either a user, or a group 16:41 <akats> Can a document own another document? 16:41 <akats> If it's not a user nor a group 16:42 <sdumitriu> No 16:42 <akats> Interesting. Ok. I'll change it. 18:28 <akats> has quit 18:34 <mcupak> has quit 20:09 <allasm> has quit
